actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Special Committee on Aging, S. Rept. 93-608.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-645.

official_title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Aging for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Increases to $411,000 (now $375,000) the expenses authorized by the Senate Special Committee on Aging for its investigations and studies pursuant to S. Res. 51, 93d Congress.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on Aging for inquiries and investigations.
